event.name: School of the Arts Fall 2021 Assembly: Partnered Studios Course
event.shortDescription: Hear from colleagues about Partnered Studios courses ï»¿and be inspired to teach your own!

description.html: Partnered Studios is a course offered every semester to our undergraduate students here at Emerson. On October 28th at 2pm ET on Zoom, Thomas Vogel, Rashin Fahandeg, and Ioana Jucan will be talking about how their journeys with their respective partners have evolved over time. RSVP to this event by Friday, October 22nd:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScH7-bXMmyBKbBCVOPK0HRj-tFLs3mRZ5xW9NyseocNenzsuQ/viewform
